datoCmsProject.title: DevConnector
datoCmsProject.description: Full stack social networking app.  Built using React, Redux, Express, MongoDb and deployed on Heroku.
datoCmsProject.moreInfo:
Features user account sign-up and login pages.  Authenticated users can create, edit and delete profiles.  Authenticated users can view a posts feed where they communicate with other developers, allowing them to add, delete, like and unlike comments.  In addition to user entered data, user profiles also pull data in from Github and Gravatar, if available.  User's 5 most recent Github repositories and Gravatar avatar images will be displayed.

Built for learning purposes, primarily as an introduction to back-end development.  Learned the basics of Node, MongoDb and authentication using JSON web tokens.
features: Create, edit and delete user profiles
